name: CatalogEntry
title: CatalogEntry
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Orders and Observations)
description: Catalog entries are wrappers that contextualize items included in a catalog.

elements.name: CatalogEntry
elements.description: Catalog entries are wrappers that contextualize items included in a catalog.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifier uniquely assigned to the catalog entry.

elements.name: type
elements.description: The type of item - medication, device, service, protocol or other.

elements.name: orderable
elements.description: Whether the entry represents an orderable item.

elements.name: referencedItem
elements.description: The item in a catalog or definition.

elements.name: additionalIdentifier
elements.description: Used in supporting different identifiers for the same product, e.g. manufacturer code and retailer code.

elements.name: classification
elements.description: Classes of devices, or ATC for medication.

elements.name: status
elements.description: Used to support catalog exchange even for unsupported products, e.g. getting list of medications even if not prescribable.

elements.name: validityPeriod
elements.description: The time period in which this catalog entry is expected to be active.

elements.name: validTo
elements.description: The date until which this catalog entry is expected to be active.

elements.name: lastUpdated
elements.description: Typically date of issue is different from the beginning of the validity. This can be used to see when an item was last updated.

elements.name: additionalCharacteristic
elements.description: Used for examplefor Out of Formulary, or any specifics.

elements.name: additionalClassification
elements.description: User for example for ATC classification, or.

elements.name: relatedEntry
elements.description: Used for example, to point to a substance, or to a device used to administer a medication.
